discourse_list.title: Is it possible to use discounted Devcon (and / or other conferences) tickets to incentivise mining on a PoW test network

content.content: Right now there is no incentive to mine on the test net, we can’t give the tokens value by making them fungible as someone could just come along and 51% attack it. What if instead it was agreed that mining a certain amount of test ETH on a new PoW test net would allow you to purchase conference tickets at a reduced rate?
content.GPT-summary: The author proposes a solution to incentivize mining on a PoW test network by offering discounted conference tickets in exchange for mining a certain amount of test ETH. The post also invites constructive criticism and asks if this proposal is feasible.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
